product_name: CliniqueTake The Day Off Cleansing Oil Makeup Remover
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Take The Day Off Cleansing Oil Makeup Remover immediately dissolves tenacious face makeup, oil, and impurities.
details: DetailsBenefitsLightweight cleansing oil dissolves all traces of makeup and impurities.It easily glides on and rinses off cleanly with water.Leaves no residue behind.Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.Non-acnegenic.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesDenatured alcoholSynthetic colorsSLSSLESSulfatesGlutenFragranceItem 2295200How To UseApply Take the Day Off Cleansing Oil Makeup Remover to dry face with fingertips and gently massage, rinse.IngredientsCetyl Ethylhexanoate, Triethylhexanoin, PEG-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate, Polybutene, PEG-8 Diisostearate, PEG-12 Diisostearate, PPG-15 Stearyl Ether, Water / Aqua / Eau, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Glyceryl Laurate, BHT.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply Take the Day Off Cleansing Oil Makeup Remover to dry face with fingertips and gently massage, rinse.
ingredients: BHT.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: Never again
reviews.comments: I thought i like this. But ehen i used it ahain i could not get the oul off my face! Even after washing it with face soap it stayed on. I have combo skin and this just disnt do it at all! I like the DHC. No oil and does a pretty good job with my waterproof mascara and makeup.

reviews.headline: Best makeup remover!
reviews.comments: Okay so first of all anyone who says it doesn't remover eye make up is likely using it wrong. If you massage it into your skin before you dampen your skin with water, it cleans every bit of eye makeup evem waterproof mascara. This stuff is gold and have been using it for years!

reviews.headline: Best oil makeup remover
reviews.comments: Best oil makeup remover in liquid form. Doesnt hurt my eyes.

reviews.headline: Eh
reviews.comments: Soooo I tried out this product because I've heard its very good. As an employee at Ulta we use this product to remove makeup sometimes on our guests. It does what it claims to do. It removes make up. But it will NOT remove eye makeup, as in mascara, or concealer/foundation around the eye area. It will NOT remove all the make up on ur skin either. So if ur wearing medium-heavy make up you might want to finish off with a make up wipe. I expected more for the price point.

reviews.headline: Great at removing makeup
reviews.comments: I love this makeup remover. I love thag its a pump and i dont have to dip my fingers in a jar. I love that its not irritating to the eyes. And i love thag it removes all of my makeup.

reviews.headline: Fabulous Cleanser! :)
reviews.comments: This oil cleanser has the most beautiful texture & removes makeup, sunscreen, debris & grime effortlessly. I will definitely purchase again. :)

reviews.headline: Great for dry skin
reviews.comments: No residue! Skin is comfortable and ready for serums removes bronzer well! No alcohol or fragrance works well on dry sensitive skin

reviews.headline: Love and good price point
reviews.comments: I have dry skin this hydrating does not leave behind and residue. My  skin is sensitive I have no issues with redness it's is fragrance free as well and soothes my rosacea! Skin is comfortable and clean removed bronzing foundation and mascara.

reviews.headline: All in one
reviews.comments: I keep buying this! I have oily skin. This takes all my makeup off with out the greasy feeling. It clouds my eyes if I open my eyes while appliying it, but it goes away after I wash my face. Does not irritate my eyes and no greasy residue.

reviews.headline: Doesn't cause styes or other eye problems
reviews.comments: I have been using this oil for at least 10 or more years. It's never caused a breakout or an eye irritation. I've tried other brands such as Farmacy's Green Clean which although it worked well, it caused a painful stye in my eye which i had to have treated by my eye doctor. He said he's seen women have this issue due to makeup or cleansers. I use several pumps which I rub in, then add warm water, rinse, and fully wipe it off with a wet makeup eraser. I also use a gentle water based eye makeup remover for more stubborn eyeliner which is why I'm only giving 4 stars. It doesn't remove all eye makeup unless you don't use much. I'd recommend this.

reviews.headline: Doesn't cause styes or other eye problems
reviews.comments: I have been using this oil for at least 10 or more years. It's never caused a breakout or an eye irritation. I've tried other brands such as Farmacy's Green Clean which although it worked well, it caused a painful stye in my eye which i had to have treated by my eye doctor. He said he's seen women have this issue due to makeup or cleansers. I use several pumps which I rub in, then add warm water, rinse, and fully wipe it off with a wet makeup eraser. I also use a gentle water based eye makeup remover for more stubborn eyeliner which is why I'm only giving 4 stars. It doesn't remove all eye makeup unless you don't use much. I'd recommend this.

reviews.headline: Love this cleanser!
reviews.comments: Makes me feel soft and succulent like a baby's booty! Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Burns my eyes
reviews.comments: Im a little disappointed because This product burns and blurs my eyes.  Not sure why, will have to return this item for a refund ir exchange for different product.

reviews.headline: I will purchase again and again
reviews.comments: It is the right moisturizer for me. Clean well

reviews.headline: Good product
reviews.comments: Love this product

reviews.headline: perfection.
reviews.comments: I use Double wear foundation and with other cleansers I have to double cleanse - with this oil its one and done - perfectly clean skin

reviews.headline: Love shopping through Ulta!
reviews.comments:
I ordered 3 items from Clinique to get a free gift with purchase. 
I was nervous about ordering this cleansing oil due to previous comments about it spilling out everywhere during shipping. 
I did not have that problem thankfully! 
My cleansing oil didn't spill out and everything was packaged nicely.

reviews.headline: Love the product, HATE the shipping
reviews.comments: So this is my favorite cleansing oil of all time. It's the best! However, I would never purchase it online from Ulta ever again. Twice, it has come about 1/4-1/3 empty with oil spilled all over the packaging! It's an absolute mess because of Ulta's way of shipping it. They don't secure the pump and put it in a very thin mailer. Not how a cleansing oil should be shipped. I received a refund both times but it was suggested to me by customer service to 'only purchase this product in stores from now on'. Yeah I will, BUT the packaging for shipping still needs to improve on Ulta's end.

reviews.headline: Good stuff!
reviews.comments: Love it! You definitely have to use another cleanser afterwards but it melts the makeup right off.

reviews.headline: I have bought this product several times.
reviews.comments: Does not require a lot of rubbing to remove make up.

media.headline: I will purchase again and again

faceoff_positive.comments: I've had this for a few weeks now and I really like it! It's way less messy than the balm and I love that I can just pump a few pumps into my hand instead of digging in a jar. It removes my eye makeup pretty well but i do have to admit i still have a little residue under my eyes from eye liner. I used this before I actually cleanse though so it works perfectly for me. I do have acne prone skin but this doesn't appear to break me out thankfully. Don't be scared of the liquidity of this, I just pump in into my cupped palm and rub my hands together then put on my dry face and I don't get it anywhere.
faceoff_positive.headline: Just as good as balm

faceoff_negative.comments: I used this product how it was recommend to use. Apply to dry skin with dry hands and massage all over face and eyes to remove makeup, and rinse. Well it works.. but my skin started breaking out EXTREMELY bad. I rarely get breakouts due to finding a skin care routine that works for my skin. After a week of using my skin was covered with breakouts!!! This was my first and LAST Clinique purchase.
faceoff_negative.headline: No... Just no.

rollup.name: Take The Day Off Cleansing Oil Makeup Remover
